# macOS-specific bash configuration
export PATH=/usr/local/bin:/opt/homebrew/bin:$PATH

# Aliases for macOS
alias ll='ls -alF -G'
alias la='ls -A -G'
alias l='ls -CF -G'
alias grep='grep --color=auto'

# macOS package manager shortcuts
alias brew-update='brew update && brew upgrade'
alias brew-search='brew search'
alias brew-list='brew list'

# Development tools
export EDITOR=nano
export BROWSER=safari

# History configuration
HISTSIZE=10000
HISTFILESIZE=20000
set -o history

# Git aliases
alias gs='git status'
alias ga='git add'
alias gc='git commit'
alias gp='git push'
alias gl='git log --oneline'

# macOS specific
alias finder='open -a Finder'
alias code='open -a "Visual Studio Code"'

echo "macOS bash configuration loaded"
